Illegal aliens are a growing problem in San Luis Obispo County, and this growth has been neglected by the federal government, said a border patrol agent with 20 years experience. However, a new immigration law passed by Congress could change the nature of the job. Currently, Congress has set a limit of four agents to work in the San Liiis Obispo office of the U.S. Border Patrol, said Agent Ray Fuhrmann.
